## HashChangeEvent interface

A hash change event.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface HashChangeEvent 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [hash](./webshell.hashchangeevent.hash.md) | string | The hash (“\#” included). |
|  [targetElementBoundingRect](./webshell.hashchangeevent.targetelementboundingrect.md) | DOMRect | The bounding rectangle of the element targeted by hash. See [Element.getBoundingClientRect()](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Element/getBoundingClientRect) |
